text: I'm trying to figure out what the new-chain configuration _exactly_ looks like. (I'm writing a test client that sends such transactions.) Chime in here, if you have thoughts: <https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FAB-998?focusedCommentId=19750&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-19750>
